subject: Night wrong control box
description_text:
Will the pro box work Plusx pedals even though the connector is bigger?? Waited 2 weeks just to find out I got the wrong one 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Ordered the right set maybe we can set up an exchange or something
Hi Ryan R,    You can use the Pro X box and Simhub to control haptics, while using the original box to control the pedals.
I got the Plus X pedals is what I shoulda have added, worried about trying too plug into the PlusX pedals into the pro box
